patterns.name: Xi-after-family
patterns.description: Meta-synthesis lift of a lower-tier family into the Ξ-space.

patterns.name: family-after-Xi
patterns.description: Pushforward of synthesized states through lower-tier operators.

patterns.name: Xi-normal-form
patterns.description: Collapse of any expression into its unique Ξ-normal form.

procedure: 1\) Instantiate P1: XiVar ∘ Family, result XiVar(Family), role=Xi\_lift.
2\) Instantiate P2: Family ∘ XiVar, result Family⟨XiVar⟩, role=Xi\_pushforward.
Additionally, treat P3 as a meta-rule over arbitrary Expr.
